page.title: 18THE FUNCTIONS OF ORMSKIRK
page.content: Ormskirk has many functions. On the one hand it is a market town and a dormitory town but it also has many industries. However, the industries are of a light nature and only the engineering firm of Hattersleys is a large employer of labour in the town. The town and the surrounding district suffers from a very high unemployment rate, however, there are many light jobs available on a part time basis and on a seasonal basis on the surrounding farms. Ormskirk is an important service centre. Many people come to shop even on the non market days and there is a wide variety of shops of all types ranging from the small family run bread and cake shops to large furniture shops selling high quality goods.For fashion goods, however, most people shop in Liverpool and Southport
